```{r }
# Select only temperature 
temp.data <- data[,c("Date.Time", 
                     "Tank1_Temp", 
                     "Tank2_Temp", 
                     "Tank3_Temp",
                     "Tank4_Temp",
                     "Tank5_Temp", 
                     "Tank6_Temp", 
                     "Tank7_Temp",
                     "Tank8_Temp",
                     "Tank9_Temp",
                     "Tank10_Temp", 
                     "Tank11_Temp", 
                     "Tank12_Temp", 
                     "Tank15_Temp",
                     "Tank16_Temp", 
                     "Tank17_Temp", 
                     "Tank18_Temp")]

# Rename columns
colnames(temp.data) <- c("Date.Time", 
                     "Tank1", 
                     "Tank2", 
                     "Tank3",
                     "Tank4",
                     "Tank5", 
                     "Tank6", 
                     "Tank7",
                     "Tank8",
                     "Tank9",
                     "Tank10", 
                     "Tank11", 
                     "Tank12", 
                     "Tank15",
                     "Tank16", 
                     "Tank17", 
                     "Tank18")

# Convert to Long
temp.trt.data <- pivot_longer(temp.data, cols = Tank1:Tank18, names_to="Tank" )

## Need to remove times when logger was out of water

# Plot and save 
ggplot(temp.trt.data, aes(x=Date.Time, y=value)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = Tank), size = 1)+
  #ylim(5,15)+
  ylab("Temperature °C")
ggsave("../output/Hobo/temp_light_logger/All_Tank_HoboTemp_Treatment.pdf", plot = last_plot(), width = 8, height = 4)

```


```{r }
# Select only light 
light.data <- data[,c("Date.Time", 
                     "Tank1_Light", 
                     "Tank2_Light", 
                     "Tank3_Light",
                     "Tank4_Light",
                     "Tank5_Light", 
                     "Tank6_Light", 
                     "Tank7_Light",
                     "Tank8_Light",
                     "Tank9_Light",
                     "Tank10_Light", 
                     "Tank11_Light", 
                     "Tank12_Light", 
                     "Tank15_Light",
                     "Tank16_Light", 
                     "Tank17_Light", 
                     "Tank18_Light")]
colnames(light.data) <- c("Date.Time", 
                     "Tank1", 
                     "Tank2", 
                     "Tank3",
                     "Tank4",
                     "Tank5", 
                     "Tank6", 
                     "Tank7",
                     "Tank8",
                     "Tank9",
                     "Tank10", 
                     "Tank11", 
                     "Tank12", 
                     "Tank15",
                     "Tank16", 
                     "Tank17", 
                     "Tank18")

# Convert to Long
light.trt.data <- pivot_longer(light.data, cols = Tank1:Tank18, names_to="Tank" )

## Need to remove times when logger was out of water

# Plot and save
ggplot(light.trt.data, aes(x=Date.Time, y=value)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = Tank), size = 1) +
  scale_fill_brewer("Dark2") +
  ylab("Light (lux)")
ggsave("../output/Hobo/temp_light_logger/All_Tank_HoboLight_Treatment.pdf", plot = last_plot(), width = 8, height = 4)

```
